page.title: 12Life Styles.
page.content: The streets bordering the area we have explored are Cheetham Hill Rd., Mottram Road, and Yew Tree Lane. Grosvenor Rd. By-Pass was built to relieve the traffic congestion in Stalybridge centre. This is a description of the first two roads, which we saw as typical of the area. The children wrote, 'as we went down Cheetham Hill Road we saw the Futura Rubber Company, which makes footwear. On the way we passed lots of pubs. Here are some of their names. The Feathers, The Liston, The Stone Jug, Old Hunters' Tavern, Hare and Hound, Dog and Partridge, and Wagon and Horses. In Lord St., we passed a playground. In the new Shopping Arcade, there is a Butchers, a Greengrocers, a Post Office, Newsagents, Bakers, Laundrette, Supermarket, and Fashion Shop.
